amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) by $350 million which is offset by reductions in funding from various other accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) by $350 million offset by reductions in funds from various other accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mrs. Capito.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
